<<<<<<< HEAD
A discourse of the covenants that God made with men before the law wherein the covenant of circumcision is more largely handled, and the invalidity of the plea for pædobaptism taken from thence discovered / by Nehemiah Coxe. Coxe, Nehemiah.
[11], 195 p.
Printed by J.D. and are to be sold by Nathaniel Ponder ... and Benjamin Alsop ..., [London] : 1681.
Place of publication from Wing. Page 183 is cropped in filmed copy. Pages 170 to end of book photographed from British Library copy and inserted at end. Errata on p. [11]. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======
